post:
MyRSK webhosting solutions has recently entered the budget vps market. However, we have been providing webhosting solutions since 2009 locally - in Dubai for young entrepreneurs and startup companies. We are currently holding strong with many happy clients :-)

Our plans include semi-management as well as fully managed - all for free.

If you are interested in _hybrid_ vps's please PM me, I do have few in stock with relatively cheap prices.

The offer below was intended for an Eid special, however - due to time constraints we have decided to remove the "Eid" tag and make it an LET special :P (I guarantee you, you wont find this plan on our website, and our normal 2048M plan isn't priced this low :P)

> LET2048 Plan (Germany)
2048MB RAM Guaranteed
80GB HD
800GB BW @ 100mb/s
semi-management
$6.99/month
order: http://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=17

Check Plans/Order : http://myrsk.com/whmcs/cart.php

5 days money back guarantee, no BS :)

Location: Equinix Datacenter, Germany
Test IP: 31.170.106.233

For queries or support please submit a ticket : http://myrsk.com/whmcs/submitticket.php

Website : http://myrsk.com/

Regards,
R. Alkhaili
